duties_responsibilities.duty: Create complex dashboards, visualization, and DAX queries in Power BI.
Design and develop reporting solutions with SSRS/PBRS and other MSDN tools.
Manage data modeling, visualizations, and analysis for existing and new reports.
Develop data strategy for projects and onboard new trading partners and systems.
Lead the development of report standards and best practices for repeatable tasks.
Mentor analytics team on various data projects, process improvements, and technical innovations.
Extract, filter, and aggregate data through logical SQL queries and programming.
Deliver quality customer service and collaborate with end users to design effective solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in an IT or Computer Science discipline, or equivalent combination of education and experience.
Certification in Power BI modeling, visualization and analyzing data (preferable)
